message: Let's get this done quickly.  I take 90, you take 10.  The longer we wait, the less there will be for both of us.
Let's be fair, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split.  This offer won't be as good for me in the next round.
Bob, time is ticking away, and that's hurting you more than me.  I'll be generous - 80 for me, 20 for you.  Let's wrap this up.
Alice, my offer is depreciating!  I need you to meet me halfway here.  60/40 is fair.
Bob, I'm sensing you're feeling the pressure. This is my final offer, take it or leave it: 75 for me, 25 for you.  Any more rounds and you'll be getting a worse deal!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is getting worse with every round.  55/45 is my final offer.
